text: Vandiny trampoty is a 1938 Czechoslovak comedy film, directed by Miroslav Cikán. It stars Věra Ferbasová, Theodor Pištěk, and Jiří Dohnal. ==References== ==External links== *Vandiny trampoty at the Internet Movie Database Category:1938 films Category:Czechoslovak films Category:Czechoslovak comedy films Category:1938 comedy films Category:Films directed by Miroslav Cikán Category:Czech films Category:Czechoslovak black-and-white films
title: Vandiny trampoty
